formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of wsadmin, including filename and extension. If the path in which wsadmin is stored in the path environmental variable, the absolute path is ommited. i.e: '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are gathered from the given configuration.

formElement.label: Cell Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of cell in which the cluster to be deleted resides.

formElement.label: cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the cluster to delete.

formElement.label: Forcefully delete?:
formElement.documentation: When this checkbox is selected, the running cluster is stopped and then deleted.

formElement.label: Connection Type:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of connection to use to connect to the application server that you want to administer. The valid choices are SOAP, RMI, and NONE.
